item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Koji - New Haven

Late night sushi bar Koji opened this past spring on Temple Street in downtown New Haven. The bar offers specialty cocktails, saki, beer and wine. The food menu (that offers more than just sushi) has been revamped a little bit since our last visit, but offers many similar unique options. Some of you may be familiar with their sister venue in Hartford.

The Manager (Darren) has offered us the following specials good until 8:00:
1/2 price Appetizers and drinks.
$5 Top Shelf Drinks.

AJ will host this happy hour and can be reached at 315-345-9348 should you have any issues.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour - Koji
